nodes.text: A Shien reverse grip customization was a lightsaber attachment that made it easier for the wielder to hold their weapon with a reverse grip, an action that popular with practitioners of Form V. The grip cost 100 credits.
Shien reverse grip customizations were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
